name: Beginner's Luck (Moolordking)
description:
Beginner's Luck 

a simple platformer (sort of) where you use the powers of randomness to bypass enemies and find treasure.

All levels are randomly generated.

Please pardon bugs and bits, I threw this together last minute.

Enjoy :)

*******************************

controls: press the arrows to choose a direction, then click, or click and drag, the dice to find out your power.

*******************************

Created in the holy trinity of HTML, CSS and JS (with a twinge of JQUERY), no game engine or external assets used.
